resources.string: Choose A Color For The Lights:

Each button activates the adjacent buttons, turning them on or off. Try to get all of the buttons off in order to win! \n \n To change the colors, go to the Color Setting screen to choose the color of the lights when the are on.

About Me: My name is Aidan Macadam and I am a senior at UML. 
 
 The game is a small version of the lights game, in which the objective is to try and turn every light off in the least amount of moves possible. 
 
 Version Number: 1.0
